mapper.select: SELECT `user`.id, `user`.username, `user`.`password`, `user`.is_account_non_expired AS account_non_expired, `user`.is_account_non_locked AS account_non_locked, `user`.is_credentials_non_expired as credentials_non_expired, `user`.is_enabled AS enabled, employee_basics.id AS employee_id, employee_basics.`name`, employee_basics.email_address, employee_basics.department, employee_basics.tel FROM `user` LEFT JOIN employee_basics ON `user`.employee_basics_id = employee_basics.id WHERE `user`.username = #{username}

SELECT project_employee.project_id, GROUP_CONCAT(permission_basics.`name`) AS permissions FROM project_employee INNER JOIN person_permission ON project_employee.id = person_permission.project_employee_id INNER JOIN permission_basics ON person_permission.permission_id = permission_basics.id WHERE project_employee.employee_id = #{employeeId} GROUP BY project_employee.project_id
